item.title: Outside 381 Sutherland avenue, 22nd July
item.description:
This van has been here for weeks, abusing the parking bay so that no one else can use it. It never moves and it is obstructing our view when pulling off of our drive as we can’t see round the bend until we are out in the road which is dangerous. There used to be a parking permit sign for this bay but it’s fallen down and not been replaced. Can this be looked into?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sutherland Avenue, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: London Bridge Walk, 22nd July
item.description:
Hi, the lighting on London bridge walk is very poor. Between the station and the bridge the walkway/parade of shops has very little light at night. It is not safe as you can't see where you are stepping. And it's definitely doesn't feel safe from a personal security point of view. Please fix.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Bridge Walk, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: All out - three or more street lights in a row

item.title: Wrong way driving, 22nd July
item.description:
Cars are still driving down it from green lanes even though it is a one way street. We need more signage to stop this, as they travel really fast down it and I have seen some very near accidents when it meets Coster Avenue.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
